title: Google\Cloud\BinaryAuthorization\V1beta1\AdmissionWhitelistPattern
name: AdmissionWhitelistPattern
description:
An [admission allowlist pattern][google.cloud.binaryauthorization.v1beta1.AdmissionWhitelistPattern] exempts images from checks by [admission rules][google.cloud.binaryauthorization.v1beta1.AdmissionRule].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.binaryauthorization.v1beta1.AdmissionWhitelistPattern

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name_pattern
params.description: An image name pattern to allowlist, in the form registry/path/to/image. This supports a trailing * as a wildcard, but this is allowed only in text after the registry/ part. * wildcard does not match /, i.e., gcr.io/nginx* matches gcr.io/nginx@latest, but it does not match gcr.io/nginx/image. This also supports a trailing ** wildcard which matches subdirectories, i.e., gcr.io/nginx** matches gcr.io/nginx/image.

methods.name: getNamePattern
methods.description:
An image name pattern to allowlist, in the form registry/path/to/image.

This also supports a trailing ** wildcard which matches subdirectories, i.e., gcr.io/nginx** matches gcr.io/nginx/image.
